function.name: generateImage
function.description: Generates an image using DALL-E 3 based on a text prompt, if the user hasn't provided a size or style, use your best judgement to choose appropriate values based on the prompt

prompt.description: A detailed text description of the desired image

size.description: The size of the generated image

style.description: The style of the generated image. 'vivid' for hyper-real and dramatic, 'natural' for less hyper-real
